c74object.name: abc.mc.substractsynth~
c74object.description:
abc.mc.substractsynth~ enable substractive synthesis by instantiating banks of band pass filters on incoming sounds either white, pink, decorrelated etc. sounds (having filterQ as quality factor, and filterG as filter gain).
f0 is the general fundamental frequency. fmult0, fmult1, etc. are the multipliers of f0 to get the frequencies of the partials. For an harmonic spectrum, one can use fmult0 = 1, fmult1 = 2, fmult2 = 3 etc. The amplitudes of the partials (in dB) can also be set individually thanks to amp0, amp1, etc. messages. gain (in dB) is the general control of the amplitude.

objarg.name: instances
objarg.digest: sets the number of modules of substractive synthesis

attribute.name: f0
attribute.description: sets the general fundamental frequency in Hz [init=220:min=0.01:max=15000:step=0.01].
attribute.digest: sets the general fundamental frequency in Hz

attribute.name: gain
attribute.description: sets the general volume in dB [init=0:min=-127:max=18:step=0.01].

attribute.name: filterQ
attribute.description: sets the factor of quality of all filters [init=50:min=1:max=500:step=1].
attribute.digest: sets the factor of quality of filters

attribute.name: filterG
attribute.description: sets the gain of all filters [init=0.8:min=0:max=1:step=0.01].
attribute.digest: sets the factor of quality of filters

attribute.name: amp[index]
attribute.description: sets the amplitude of the [index] partial in dB [init=dB(1/[index]):min=-127:max=18:step=0.01].
attribute.digest: sets the amplitude of the [index] partial

attribute.name: fmult[index]
attribute.description: sets the multiplier of the fundamental f0 to tune the [index] filter [init=[index]:min=0:max=1000:step=0.00001].
attribute.digest: sets the multiplier of the fundamental f0 to tune the [index] filter
